definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多么坚贞，也敌不过下半身的软弱。

sentences.english: I can still move my upper body.
sentences.chinese: 我的上半身依旧活动自如。

sentences.english: The occurrence of plaque blood fluid does not stagnate, due to stasis in the upper body.
sentences.chinese: 斑的发生是气血津液不凝滞，郁积在上半身所致。

sentences.english: But some of the features from the upper part of the body, including the shoulder blade(17) and arms are more ape-like.
sentences.chinese: 但上半身的一些特征，包括肩胛骨和胳膊更象猿。

sentences.english: You do not want you upper body and lower body to turn together.
sentences.chinese: 不要让上半身和下半身一起转动。

sentences.english: Simultaneously raise legs and torso. Don't bend your knees!
sentences.chinese: 把上半身和腿同时抬起，但不要弯曲膝盖。

sentences.english: Hester partly raised him, and supported his head against her bosom.
sentences.chinese: 海丝特撑起他的上半身，让他的头靠在自己的胸前。

sentences.english: He suffered serious burns to his upper body and spent the night in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身严重灼烧，在城内艰难的熬过了那个晚上。

sentences.english: This body shape is usually bigger up top and smaller on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 这种体型的人通常上半身块头较大而下半身比例稍小。

sentences.english: The other big problem is slouching in the upper body.
sentences.chinese: 另外一大问题是伛偻的上半身。

sentences.english: So on the backswing, your upper body is turning your lower body into your right side.
sentences.chinese: 在上杆的时候，上半身是带动着下半身转到右侧的。

sentences.english: But some of the features from the upper part of the body, including the shoulder blade and arms are more ape-like.
sentences.chinese: 但上半身的一些特征，包括肩胛骨和胳膊更象猿。

sentences.english: He is too paralysed in his upper body to be able to operate ReWalk.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身的病情过于严重，不能操作“重新行走”。

sentences.english: I will go a few miles before I realize that I've been tensing up my upper body.
sentences.chinese: 我跑了几英里后才意识到我上半身太紧张了。

sentences.english: Your upper torso—your buoy—is just like that water polo ball.
sentences.chinese: 你的上半身就是你的浮漂，也就像那个水球。

definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
the four limbs of the body
